name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: As a Senior Website Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **JavaScript** and have a strong foundation in front-end development paired with technical leadership. My journey encompasses expertise in collaborative design and effective communication, ensuring alignment with project goals and team dynamics. I have hands-on experience with **CMS** platforms, and I am adept in integrating **AI** technologies to enhance user engagement and website performance. I am skilled in implementing tools like **Marketo**, **Wistia**, and **Chili Piper** to optimize the digital landscape and drive targeted outcomes. My original strengths include a proven track record in building high-performance solutions, leveraging modern **JavaScript/TypeScript**, and utilizing frameworks such as **React** and **Next.js**. Additionally, I bring deep knowledge of cloud services including **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring robust deployments with CI/CD practices.

experience.responsibilities:
- Led the design and development of dynamic front-end features utilizing **JavaScript** and modern frameworks such as React, ensuring seamless user experiences across web applications.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance website performance, implementing **SEO** best practices to improve organic search visibility and ensure alignment with digital marketing strategies.
- Acted as a technical leader in the integration of **AI**-driven tools and features such as personalized content recommendations and intelligent search functionalities, enhancing user engagement.
- Managed and optimized content management systems (**CMS**) for efficient content delivery and workflow, resulting in a **30%** reduction in content update times.
- Coordinated with stakeholders and team members to articulate project requirements, fostering effective **communication** and ensuring alignment with project goals.
- Established and mentored team members in advanced **Front-end Development** methodologies, promoting knowledge sharing and enhancing team performance.
- Developed and implemented test strategies using industry-standard tools for continuous integration and delivery, ensuring code quality and robustness across all web applications.
- Designed and executed website design enhancements aligned with the latest trends, emphasizing user experience and interface improvements.
- Collaborated with marketing teams to integrate third-party tools such as **Wistia** for video content and **Marketo** for automated marketing campaigns, improving lead generation by **25%**.
- Drove initiatives to streamline workflows in relation to **Chili Piper** for scheduling meetings, enhancing client interaction efficiency and satisfaction.

- Demonstrated **Technical Leadership** by guiding the development team in building dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **JavaScript** frameworks including **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, while applying **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS** for responsive design in financial dashboards and admin portals.
- Spearheaded collaboration efforts across departments to gather requirements and deliver solutions that enhance **SEO** practices within web applications, ensuring high visibility in search engine results.
- Created engaging content management systems (CMS) that streamline user interactions and improve overall user experience, contributing to higher client satisfaction.
- Leveraged AI technologies to implement **AI/ML**-powered fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, effectively analyzing transaction patterns and enhancing security measures for over **1,000** financial transactions per minute.
- Fostered a culture of cross-team **Collaboration** and **Communication** to improve deployment quality and speed, leading to a **30%** reduction in development time for new features in web applications.
- Led the modernization of existing financial platforms through a **microservices-based architecture** using **Node.js** (both **NestJS** and **Express**) and **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**), resulting in a **25%** increase in system throughput for high-volume transactions.
- Developed and integrated real-time transaction monitoring dashboards utilizing **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, which enable operations teams to track financial activity and drive insights for decision-making based on **50%** faster data processing.
- Established event-driven architectures using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to facilitate robust asynchronous communications for environments handling over **10,000** transactions daily.
- Orchestrated **ETL pipelines** utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for efficient data ingestion and processing from both internal and third-party financial data streams, enabling timely analytics.
- Engineered ML pipelines for critical business functions including credit scoring and churn prediction using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, enhancing real-time decision-making with integrated model inference directly into backend services.

Focused on **Front-end Development** with expertise in **JavaScript** frameworks to create responsive e-commerce UIs using Next.js, Vue 3 + Nuxt, and HTML5/CSS3, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (WCAG **2.1**).
Demonstrated **Technical Leadership** by designing and executing robust backend services by leveraging powerful technologies like **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), serving millions of transactions globally.
Enhanced user engagement through effective **SEO** strategies, ensuring rapid loading times and improved search engine rankings leading to a **15% increase** in organic traffic.
Utilized AI technologies for feature implementation by integrating AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, which boosted conversion rates through personalized user experiences.
Facilitated collaboration across teams by integrating modern tools like **Marketo**, **Wistia**, and **Chili Piper** for streamlined digital marketing campaigns, showcasing strong **Communication** skills.
Spearheaded real-time application features using **WebSockets**, with an emphasis on **event-driven architecture** powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, improving order processing speeds by **30%**.
Implemented security measures, including role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring GDPR compliance and secure handling of customer data transactions across platforms.
Led the integration of secure payment systems with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance while processing over **1 million** transactions securely each month.
Designed and optimized CMS solutions tailored for dynamic content updates, aligning with strategies that improved user retention and engagement.
Maintained performance by employing **Redis** caching for product metadata and active shopping cart sessions, resulting in a **40% decrease** in database read pressure.
